leds.c

00033 
00034 #include "dev/leds.h"
00035 #include "sys/clock.h"
00036 #include "sys/energest.h"
00037 
00038 static unsigned char leds, invert;
00039 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00040 static void
00041 show_leds(unsigned char changed)
00042 {
00043   if(changed & LEDS_GREEN) {
00044     /* Green did change */
00045     if((invert ^ leds) & LEDS_GREEN) {
00046       ENERGEST_ON(ENERGEST_TYPE_LED_GREEN);
00047     } else {
00048       ENERGEST_OFF(ENERGEST_TYPE_LED_GREEN);
00049     }
00050   }
00051   if(changed & LEDS_YELLOW) {
00052     if((invert ^ leds) & LEDS_YELLOW) {
00053       ENERGEST_ON(ENERGEST_TYPE_LED_YELLOW);
00054     } else {
00055       ENERGEST_OFF(ENERGEST_TYPE_LED_YELLOW);
00056     }
00057   }
00058   if(changed & LEDS_RED) {
00059     if((invert ^ leds) & LEDS_RED) {
00060       ENERGEST_ON(ENERGEST_TYPE_LED_RED);
00061     } else {
00062       ENERGEST_OFF(ENERGEST_TYPE_LED_RED);
00063     }
00064   }
00065   leds_arch_set(leds ^ invert);
00066 }
00067 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00068 void
00069 leds_init(void)
00070 {
00071   leds_arch_init();
00072   leds = invert = 0;
00073 }
00074 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00075 void
00076 leds_blink(void)
00077 {
00078   /* Blink all leds. */
00079   unsigned char inv;
00080   inv = ~(leds ^ invert);
00081   leds_invert(inv);
00082 
00083   clock_delay(400);
00084 
00085   leds_invert(inv);
00086 }
00087 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00088 unsigned char
00089 leds_get(void) {
00090   return leds_arch_get();
00091 }
00092 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00093 void
00094 leds_on(unsigned char ledv)
00095 {
00096   unsigned char changed;
00097   changed = (~leds) & ledv;
00098   leds |= ledv;
00099   show_leds(changed);
00100 }
00101 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00102 void
00103 leds_off(unsigned char ledv)
00104 {
00105   unsigned char changed;
00106   changed = leds & ledv;
00107   leds &= ~ledv;
00108   show_leds(changed);
00109 }
00110 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00111 void
00112 leds_toggle(unsigned char ledv)
00113 {
00114   leds_invert(ledv);
00115 }
00116 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00117 /*   invert the invert register using the leds parameter */
00118 void
00119 leds_invert(unsigned char ledv) {
00120   invert = invert ^ ledv;
00121   show_leds(ledv);
00122 }
00123 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
